mapper.insert: insert into trans_api_relay_data ( chacd, packetno, dealseqno, trcode, destination, trans_success_yn, transdt, updatedt ) values ( #{chacd, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{packetno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealseqno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{trcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destination,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{transSuccessYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
